trans-unit.source: Lists the uploaded items whose IDs already exist in the target system.

seg-source.mrk: Lists the uploaded items whose IDs already exist in the target system.

target.mrk: 列出目標系統含有 ID 的上傳項目。

trans-unit.source: Lists the rules, methods, and selections that are uploaded from the spreadsheet and have IDs identical with the existing ones in your current system. The existing items may have the <uicontrol>Active</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Draft</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>Inactive</uicontrol> status. Therefore, you need to compare the duplicates and decide if you want to skip the uploaded items or to import them so that the existing items are overwritten.

seg-source.mrk: Lists the rules, methods, and selections that are uploaded from the spreadsheet and have IDs identical with the existing ones in your current system.
The existing items may have the <uicontrol>Active</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>Draft</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>Inactive</uicontrol> status.
Therefore, you need to compare the duplicates and decide if you want to skip the uploaded items or to import them so that the existing items are overwritten.

target.mrk: 列出從試算表上傳且 ID 與目前系統中現有項目相同的規則、方法和選擇。
現有項目的狀態可能為 <uicontrol>[啟用中]</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>[草稿]</uicontrol> 或 <uicontrol>[未啟用]</uicontrol>。
因此，您需要比較重複項目並決定您要跳過上傳項目，或是匯入以覆寫現有項目。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to import the duplicated items anyway, only the draft version of existing items are overwritten because all the imported items have an initial status <uicontrol>Draft</uicontrol>. However, the subsequent <uicontrol>Mass Activation</uicontrol> action can activate these imported items and overwrite the existing active rules, methods, or selections.

seg-source.mrk: If you choose to import the duplicated items anyway, only the draft version of existing items are overwritten because all the imported items have an initial status <uicontrol>Draft</uicontrol>.
However, the subsequent <uicontrol>Mass Activation</uicontrol> action can activate these imported items and overwrite the existing active rules, methods, or selections.

target.mrk: 若您仍選擇匯入重複項目，由於所有匯入項目的初始狀態皆為 <uicontrol>[草稿]</uicontrol>，因此僅會覆寫現有項目的草稿版本。
然而，後續的 <uicontrol>[大量啟用]</uicontrol> 動作將啟用這些匯入項目並覆寫現有的啟用中規則、方法或選擇。
